name: Lumbermill
storyline:
Hire Lumberjacks to chop trees, Mechanics to maintain your machines, and Arborists to look after the forest. Research and construct factories for processing lumber, and sell your products for the highest value to keep your business thriving.

Uncover the procedurally-generated forest and discover secrets along the way.

Be careful with how you maintain the forest though, as deforestation, competition, broken machines and rogue employees can spell disaster for the Lumber Mill.
summary: Build, manage and maintain a Lumber Mill deep in the forest!
